text: Agnes Flora (born June 18, 1987 - August 8, 2005) by Royal Ski, and out of Agnes Lady at Masayoshi Orite was a bay, retired racehorse who won the Oka Sho in Japan. ==Life and career== Agnes Flora is a bay mare by Royal Ski, and out of Agnes Lady. She is mostly known for her major win at the Oka Sho carrying four hundred and fifty-two pounds. She also won the Tulip Sho and Elfin Stakes in Japan. In 1990, Agnes Flora won the award for "Best Three-Year-Old Filly." She died on August 8, 2005. == References == Category:1987 racehorse births Category:racehorses bred in Japan Category:racehorses trained in Japan Category:Thoroughbred family 1-l
title: Agnes Flora
